history.proof: hauto lq: on use: div_prop, Nat.lt_1_2, Nat.add_comm, Nat.mul_comm.

exceptions.exn: No such bound variable r (possible names are: q and p).

original: rewrite div_rem_spec1 with (r := rem (1 + 2 * n) 2). rewrite rem_2_fix_2. rewrite div_prop with (n := n) (r := 1). rewrite div_2_fix_1. reflexivity. apply rem_2_fix_2.
